guide.title: Gnome 2.18 Upgrade Guide
guide.abstract: This is a guide for upgrading from GNOME 2.16.x to GNOME 2.18.x.

body.p: Control Center has changed from a menu-based system to a window-based system by default. The old menu system is available, if you'd prefer to use it. To get it back, just right click on the System menu and select "Edit Menus". Then, select "Desktop" in the left pane. In the right pane, check "Control Center" to enable the menu entry for the window-based contol center, or check "Preferences" to enable the old menu-based preferences. Uncheck either or both to disable them.
